__e: It's not easy when your hands are zip-tied behind your back.
Do you want me to find this guy with one hand tied behind my back?
Sir, may I say with all due respect of course... you know the hands of the police are tied and measures must be taken to... to give us more freedom.
I've been unjustly imprisoned like this yet mortals run as rampantly as they want. Princess don't ask him like that. He will go mad!
Now that I've promised him that you or your people will not leave the station I, too, am stuck with that promise, and so are you.
He came in with his arm bound up with a sack around it and he looked really... not a happy fellow.
We did not know the power that resides in every place.
Just 'cause you're chained to a guy don't make him your friend.
I don't see how she could murder these people if she was tethered to the church.
Somehow they remain present among us, joined to this world, unable to participate.
I'd marry it, but it's already attached... to the wall.
It is bound by the spell my blood and my heart.
